Question
========
A randomly selected sample of 50 people filled out a survey. The survey concerned toilet hygiene at train stations in The Netherlands. A total of 15 participants had a positive opinion on this. All other participants had a negative opinion. Based on this sample, calculate the 95% confidence interval for the proportion of people that have a *negative* opinion.

Answerlist
----------
* (0.593, 0.807) 
* (0.173, 0.427)
* (0.573, 0.827)
* (0.193, 0.407)
